DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study compare efficacy ONO-2506 versus placebo neurological stroke outcome patient acute ischemic stroke .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Effects ONO-2506 Intravenous Infusion Patients With Acute Ischemic Stroke
DOC.criteria: Patient must clinical diagnosis acute cortical ischemic stroke . Patient must randomize study within six hour initial onset stroke symptom . Patient must measurable focal neurological deficit minimum duration 60 minute . Patient must CT MRI examination compatible clinical diagnosis acute ischemic stroke . Patient must prestroke mRS scale score 0 1 . Other inclusion criterion specify study protocol . Patient must body weight 125 kg . Patient must CT and/or MRI evidence nonischemic mechanism , subarachnoid hemorrhage , primary intracerebral and/or intraventricular hemorrhage . Patient must three follow finding : 1. reduce level consciousness ( score great equal two NIHSS Question 1a ) 2. force eye deviation total gaze paresis ( score 2 NIHSS Question 2 ) 3. dense hemiplegia ( movement ) upper low extremity ( i.e. , score 4 NIHSS Question 5 regard motor arm score 4 NIHSS Question 6 regard motor leg ) . Patient must neurological sign symptom rapidly improve . Patient must severe coexist terminal systemic disease . Patient must pregnant lactating . Patient must impair hepatic function ; bilirubin great 2 mg/dL ascites . Patient must impair renal function ; serum creatinine great 2 mg/dL . Patient must congestive heart failure . Patient must baseline ECG show PR interval great 200 millisecond , correct QT interval great 480 millisecond , history ventricular arrhythmia , Mobitz Type 1 great AV block . Patient must exclusion criterion specify study protocol .
